amendment.description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 116-395 to strike all designations of potential wilderness under the bill.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike all potential wilderness designations under the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Westerman amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 233 (Roll no. 65).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Westerman.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Westerman amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 233 (Roll no. 65).
